TopicTitle: I can't believe I never thought of this!

Articles.Content: Ever go to light a campfire and the wood is a little damp, or want to coax some embers back to life? Use a battery-powered (4D or 6C) air-mattress pump supercharge those flames. Aim it at the right spot and it'll be like aiming a jet engine into the fire.
It's Great for soothing that pyromaniac inside you!
Just don't do it for a long time or do it through some sort of long-ish fireproof tube, I once did this for 2-3 minutes sans-pipe and melted the front end to oblivion.
